AboutPage.title: Hi. I'm Andrian
AboutPage.description: I'm a Frontend Developer focused on delivering scalable web solutions tailored to business needs. I'm familiar with the modern development process, particularly the frontend development lifecycle, and experienced in working within Agile methodologies, contributing as a team player. Currently, I'm working as a Trainee Frontend Developer at GlobalLogic and starting my fourth year at Lviv Polytechnic University.

hobbiesList.doingSport: Doing sport and watching football, boxing
